content: प्रणिधानं {@--1@} Applying, employing, application, use. {@--2@} Great effort, energy. {@--3@} Profound religious meditation, abstract contemplation; <ls>R. 1. 74</ls>; <ls n="R.">8. 19</ls>; <ls>V. 2.</ls> {@--4@} Respectful behaviour towards (with <ab>loc.</ab>). {@--5@} Renunciation of the fruit of actions (कर्मफलत्याग). {@--6@} Entrance, access. {@--7@} (With Buddhists) A prayer, an entreaty.
